EmailTemplate.description: PO number is available on Quote/Proposal
EmailTemplate.name: PO number available on Quote/Proposal
EmailTemplate.subject: Nokia Acknowledgment of {!User.Name} accepted recommendation of the customer PO No. {!Apttus_Proposal__Proposal__c.Apttus_QPConfig__PONumber__c} - Reference {!Apttus_Proposal__Proposal__c.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank You!
Nokia acknowledges receipt of the customer PO No. {!Apttus_Proposal__Proposal__c.Apttus_QPConfig__PONumber__c} under Frame contract {!Apttus_Proposal__Proposal__c.Frame_contract_reference__c} issued by {!User.Name} on {!Apttus_Proposal__Proposal__c.Apttus_QPConfig__PODate__c} for {!Apttus_Proposal__Proposal__c.Proposal_Recommendation_Type__c}.
Our teams will contact you after checking the PO to confirm the PO is received and confirm a delivery date.
